quote: ...[A] certain degree of un-understanding (not mis-, but un-) is the only possible sanctuary which one human being can offer to another in the midst of the devastating intimacy of a happy marriage.
quote_letters: A CERTAIN DEGREE OF UN-UNDERSTANDING NOT MIS- BUT UN- IS THE ONLY POSSIBLE SANCTUARY WHICH ONE HUMAN BEING CAN OFFER TO ANOTHER IN THE MIDST OF THE DEVASTATING INTIMACY OF A HAPPY MARRIAGE
